p: Five extracts were obtained in a series from nonpolar to polar: hexane (HE), chloroform (CE), ethanol (EE), methanol (ME), and water end extract (WEE), and the sixth was made only with water—water extract (WE). Table 1 shows that the total phenolic compounds ranged from 2.3 μg/g to 61.26 μg/g, in order HE < CE < WE < WEE < EE < ME. The sugar content ranged from 33.45 μg/g to 225.00 μg/g, and the order was CE < HE < WEE < EE < WE < ME. The protein content was low ranging from 1.1 to 4.5 μg/g.
